data.name: Sky Captain's Return
data.detailed_description:
Become a strong mecha warrior in Sky Captain's Return and conquer the enemy base with your units.

Defend your base with drones and attack the enemy base with light armored vehicles, up to heavy tanks.
Occupy outposts as secondary bases to shorten the way to the enemy base.
Capture neutral towers and destroy enemy units to earn points to buy new units.
Call special units and use their unique abilities on the battlefield.

Defeat the legendary Sky Captain, a tricky and deadly AI, with strong firepower in single player mode or compete against your friends or random players in multiplayer and see who has the better strategy.

Choose your weapon style

With 3 different weapons per weapon type, each weapon offers a different gameplay experience and the opportunity for unique strategies.

PvP or PvE

Join a friend or random player and play against each other, or face the legendary Sky Captain alone and try to defeat him on 10 different difficulty levels.

Different map styles

Choose from currently 4 different maps and master the unique challenges of each map.

Find your own strategy

Thanks to a wide range of units, there are numerous options to make every game a unique experience. Find your own strategy and adapt it to each game individually.

data.short_description: Inspired by the classics "Future Cop L.A.P.D" and "Herzog Zwei" in Sky Captain's Return, you play as a strong mecha warrior to conquer the enemy base with your units. Defeat the legendary Sky Captain in single-player mode or compete against your friends or random players.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700 6 Cores @ 3.7GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
